sys_properties.choices: file - Specifying the value as FILE indicates that logging messages for this scoped application should only be sent to the localhost file. Thus, the messages will appear in the localhost logs but not the syslog table on the instance. db - Specifying db in the Value field for this property indicates that the log messages for the scoped application should be written to both the localhost logs and the syslog table.
sys_properties.description: Controls whether logs are persisted in the db or only available in the node file logs.
sys_properties.name: x_neyu_rest_utils.logging.destination
